I'm not a verified user yet, but I posted offers on LEB and WHT forums some years ago and that's a proof that I'm not a (insert scammer word here).

**About Us**  
Ghesi is a premier hosting provider, offering reliable and scalable solutions to clients who represent a wide range of business needs. With more than 16 years experience in IT and Web services, our team of technicians will squeeze every ounce of performance out of our hardware and software resources so that you can safely and robustly run any Web application or service you need to provide your customers with the experience they deserve.

We've been in hosting business for over five years now, since August 2007. All of our plans include 99.9% uptime, prompt professional support.

If you have any questions at all, please don't refrain from asking our support staff through a support ticket, they are very supportive and looking forward to answering your requests. Response times are guaranteed to be very quick.

**Other Information**  
PayPal & Credit Card Accepted.  
Full refund within 7 days if you are not satisfied.  
Site: www.ghesi.com  
Email: suport@ghesi.com
